Build Your Land Trust Tech Stack

October 22, 2021 - less than 1 min read time
Tags: Cartography Design Mapping Project

The most common broad limiting factors at land trusts are staff time and money. One way to improve efficiency is to use software-as-a-service (SaaS) products for repeatable workflows. Letâ€™s talk about where you can incorporate tech tools into your work, how to choose the right tools for your team, and specific examples of products that improve our work and therefore, our impact.

What is a tech stack?

A tech stack is a suite of software products or other tech tools that an organization utilizes to accomplish their work, ideally offering direct integration between tools.

Why build out a tech stack?

How can you go about creating your tech stack?
